primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The revelation of the Father's joy to 'babies' (disciples) through the Son, contrasting the exhaustion of worldly power with the rest found in Jesus.

tekstueel_bewijs: you have shown it only to the infants
All things have been handed over to me by my Father

object.identificatie: The Mystery of Life / Joy / Rest

zender.identificatie: The Father (Lord of heaven and earth)
tekstueel_bewijs: I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth
anyone to whom the Son chooses to reveal him
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: Does hearer identify with Subject or Receiver?

helper.identificatie: Jesus (as the Revealer) and Martin Niemoeller (as the Witness)
tekstueel_bewijs: the Son chooses to reveal him
helper.rol_van_god: God is both Subject and the Mediator (Helper).
helper.rol_van_geest: External help (implied through the 'surge of life').

tegenstander.identificatie: The 'Wise and Intelligent' / Empire / The 'If' of Performance
tekstueel_bewijs: kings and prophets and the wise and intelligent hate the scandal
every one of those offers is with an 'if' of performance
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not just bad habits but a systemic 'world way' (Empire/Pharaoh) that creates a 'brickyard' existence.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The ethical response of the 'baby' to follow and imitate Jesus.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Hearer (Baby)
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The sermon suggests that because one has 'seen' (Primary), one then 'follows' (Secondary).

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.helper_subject_tegenstander: Jesus → God the Son ← The Wise/Empire

voorbeelden_god_subject: the Son chooses to reveal him
voorbeelden_mens_subject: If you hustle, you can get ahead
We have seen a hungry crowd
all you do is follow and imitate

voorbeelden: desired to see what you see
want to have it both ways

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon centers on 'Knowing' (Revelation) as the catalyst for 'Being Able' (Power). It deconstructs the 'Must' (Devoir) of the world.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S2 (Caliph's success) to ~S1 (Exhaustion) to ~S2 (Innocence) to S1 (Rest in Jesus).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved by the Son 'choosing' to reveal the Father, bypassing human competence.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; the 'brickyard' and 'empire' are presented as soul-crushing realities.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon identifies the human condition as 'weary' and 'burdened' by performance, positioning God as the one who acts, reveals, and gives rest.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: all you do is follow and imitate

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God chose what is foolish in the world to shame the wise
every one of those offers is with an 'if' of performance? But we know better.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Martin Niemoeller is used as a model of the 'easy yoke,' though he is framed as a witness to Jesus' power rather than his own strength.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Focus on how Jesus sustained Niemoeller in the camp, rather than Niemoeller's 'standing firmly'.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief from the pressure to perform; invitation to vulnerability.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic revelation: God must show the secret for the hearer to have it.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The contrast between the 'Wise' and 'Babies' is consistently maintained through actantial roles.
spanning_punten: The transition from 'God reveals' to 'all you do is follow' at the very end.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: the entrustment of myself to his transformative power

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The 'Son' gives the competence (Pouvoir) of rest.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is seen as the 'yoke of empire' and the 'burden of performance'—a state of being 'out of sync'.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: Strongly theocentric with God as the Subject of revelation and rest. The hearer is correctly positioned as the 'Receiver' (Baby).

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: The closing line 'all you do is follow and imitate' shifts the hearer back to Subject.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: End with the promise of Jesus' gentleness rather than the hearer's imitation.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Emphasize that Jesus doesn't just show the way, but carries the baby.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in deconstructing moralistic 'performance' through narrative semiotics.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorical analysis would focus on the 'snappy starters'; Greimas reveals the 'if/then' logic of the world actant.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the Greek 'yoke'; Greimas shows the yoke is a functional 'Opponent' actant.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'Wise' are not just people, but a structural 'Anti-Sender' of false values.

appendices.notities: The sermon uses 'Knowing' as a bridge from Law to Grace.
